title: Who Crucified the Pastor ////// 298
description:
Who Crucified the Pastor ////// 298

Part 1 of 1

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

August 23rd, 2009 a beloved Pastor was murder inside a small church in Anadarko, Oklahoma. Pastor Carol Daniels was a champion for the helpless and the hopeless. She served God and her community, offering goodwill to all. This was a brutal and horrific crime. The early reports stated her body was posed, signifying a crucifixion. Nic & The Captain discuss the unsolved murder of a very faithful and sweet lady. Beer of the Week - OK Pils by Anthem Brewing Garage Grade - 3 and 3/4 bottle caps

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
